news.details:
Version 01.010.372:

- Fixed song previews not playing.
- Changed Turbo Mode Multiplier from 2x to 1.5x to make Too Turbo To Fail trophy more achievable.

Thank you for playing Trombone Champ: Unflattened! We have a bunch of changes coming soon:

- Tons of bug fixes!
- Trombone calibration.
- Support for more languages.
- Improvements to visuals and performance.
- New songs and environments.

Find our full roadmap on <color=yellow><u>TC.FLAT2VRSTUDIOS.COM</u></color>
<size=50%>(no you can't click this link, open it in a browser)</size>
